# Datos

```{r}
world
```

```{r}
class(world)
```


# EDA

## Continent

```{r}
# basic plot with filter
world %>% 
  filter(continent == "South America") %>% 
  plot()
```

## Esperanza de Vida

```{r}
world_LE65 <- world %>% 
  filter(lifeExp > 65) %>% 
  select(name_long, lifeExp) %>% 
  arrange(desc(lifeExp)) 

world_LE65
```

### Mapa estatico

```{r}
tm_shape(world_LE65) +
  tm_borders() +
  tm_fill("lifeExp", breaks = c(65, 75, 85))
```

### Mapa interactivo

```{r}
tmap_mode("view")

map_world_LE65 <- tm_shape(world_LE65) +
  tm_borders() +
  tm_fill("lifeExp", breaks = c(65, 75, 85), alpha = .5)

map_world_LE65
```

## gdpPerCap

```{r}
world %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  get_summary_stats(gdpPercap)
```
